TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRawElementProviderFragment implements class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: 公开用户界面 (UI) 元素的方法和属性，这些元素是多于一个层次深度的结构的一部分，例如列表框或列表项。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties on user interface (UI) elements that are part of a structure more than one level deep, such as a list box or a list item.

summary.span: 由 UI 自动化提供程序实现。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须支持片段的根节点接口，该类继承自。The root node of the fragment must support the interface, which inherits from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BoundingRectangle As Rect
public: property System::Windows::Rect BoundingRectangle { System::Windows::Rect get(); };

span.span: Gets the bounding rectangle of this element.

value.span: 以屏幕坐标形式表示的边框。

span.span: The bounding rectangle, in screen coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该元素是部分模糊或位于屏幕之外，没有剪辑是必需的。No clipping is required if the element is partly obscured or partly off-screen. 属性应设置为指示矩形是否实际可见。The property should be set to indicate whether the rectangle is actually visible. 并非所有点的边框内都是一定是可单击。Not all points within the bounding rectangle are necessarily clickable. ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，边界矩形的内部状态保留在，而转换为之前返回。In the following example code, the internal state of the bounding rectangle is kept in a , which is converted to a before being returned. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FragmentRoot As IRawElementProviderFragmentRoot

span.span: Retrieves the root node of the fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现的提供程序应该返回其自身。A provider that implements should return itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例片段，如列表框中的列表项中显示的元素的实现。The following code example shows an implementation for an element in a fragment, such as a list item within a list box. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#105)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] GetEmbeddedFragmentRoots() cil managed

summary.span: 检索包含嵌入在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素树中的片段根的一个数组，该元素树以当前元素作为根节点。

span.span: Retrieves an array of fragment roots that are embedded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree rooted at the current element.
An array of root fragments, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当另一个承载当前元素，此方法返回一个数组片段[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]框架。This method returns an array of fragments only if the current element is hosting another [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] framework. 大多数提供程序返回`null`。Most providers return `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32[] GetRuntimeId() cil managed

summary.span: 检索元素的运行时标识符。

span.span: Retrieves the runtime identifier of an element.

returns.span: 元素的唯一运行时标识符。

span.span: The unique run-time identifier of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现应返回`null`的窗口句柄相对应的元素。Implementations should return `null` for an element that corresponds to a window handle. 其他元素应返回一个数组，包含后, 跟一个值，该片段中是唯一的。Other elements should return an array that contains , followed by a value that is unique within the fragment. 它是提供商的责任，以确保唯一性片段; 中例如，必须单独编号列表中的每个项。It is the provider's responsibility to ensure uniqueness within the fragment; for example, each item in a list must be individually numbered. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]引擎可确保该标识符将转换是在所有情况下，唯一值。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] engine ensures that the identifier is unique among all instances, by translating the value. ## Examples 下面的示例代码片段，如列表框中的项中的元素显示此方法的实现。The following example code shows an implementation of this method by an element within a fragment, such as an item within a list box. 项具有它自己的片段，此实例中的唯一标识符和值可确保由方法返回该标识符是唯一在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树。The item has its own unique identifier within this instance of the fragment, and the value ensures that the identifier returned by the method is unique in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment Navigate(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Provider.NavigateDirection direction) cil managed
Public Function Navigate (direction As NavigateDirection) As IRawElementProviderFragment

span.span: The direction in which to navigate.

summary.span: 按照指定方向在树中检索 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素。

span.span: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element in a specified direction within the tree.

returns.span: 指定方向上的元素；如果该方向上没有任何元素，则为 。

span.span: The element in the specified direction, or if there is no element in that direction

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]服务器的此方法的实现定义的结构[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素树。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] server's implementations of this method define the structure of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree. 导航必须支持向上的父代、 向下拖动到下一步到第一个和最后一个子和横向和上一个同级节点，（如果适用）。Navigation must be supported upward to the parent, downward to the first and last child, and laterally to the next and previous siblings, as applicable. 每个子节点具有只有一个父级且必须放置在由父到达的同级链和。Each child node has only one parent and must be placed in the chain of siblings reached from the parent by and . 在同级关系中必须相同两个方向： 如果 A 是 B 的，则 B 是 A 的。Relationships among siblings must be identical in both directions: if A is B's , then B is A's . 一个不具有，和一个未包含任何。A has no , and a has no . 片段根不支持导航到父级或同级;由默认窗口提供程序处理在片段根之间导航。Fragment roots do not enable navigation to a parent or siblings; navigation among fragment roots is handled by the default window providers. 片段中的元素必须只能导航到该片段中的其他元素。Elements in fragments must navigate only to other elements within that fragment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现由具有单个子元素的片段根。The following example code shows the implementation of by a fragment root that has a single child element. 实现元素是片段根，因为它不会启用导航到父元素或同级元素。Because the implementing element is a fragment root, it does not enable navigation to a parent element or sibling elements. [!code-csharp[UIAProvider_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/CSharp/FragmentRoot.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAProvider_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/VisualBasic/FragmentRoot.vb#105)] 下面的示例演示实现片段表示列表框中的单个项。The following example shows an implementation by a fragment that represents a single item within a list box. 在这种情况下，元素启用导航到其父级和同级节点，而不是属于任何子级。In this case, the element enables navigation to its parent and siblings, but not to any children. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetFocus() cil managed

span.span: Sets the focus to this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]框架将确保承载此片段的接口的一部分调用此方法之前已获得焦点。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] framework will ensure that the part of the interface that hosts this fragment is already focused before calling this method. 您的实现应更新仅其内部的焦点状态;例如，通过重新绘制的列表项以显示其具有焦点。Your implementation should update only its internal focus state; for example, by repainting a list item to show that it has the focus. 如果喜欢[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]不聚焦的父窗口，请设置选项中片段根。If you prefer that [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] not focus the parent window, set the option in for the fragment root.
